home.role: Full Stack Software Engineer excited to embrace life and opportunity in Norway
home.description1: I'm Wessel, a {age}-year-old full-stack software developer living in the Netherlands with {exp} years of experience. I’m skilled in building both the front-end and back-end of web applications, including creating databases and integrating software to Azure through CI/CD pipelines.
home.description2: I’ve been in love with Norway, its culture and language since childhood, and moving there is a dream I've always had. I speak fluent Norwegian, and working in Norway—whether remotely or, ideally, in-office—is my top priority. I’m excited to take the necessary steps to make this childhood dream a reality!
home.note: If you have any insights regarding {span}, or would like to have a chat with me about it, feel free to always {mail} on

hu.description1: Completed a 4-year bachelor's degree in Software Development, focusing on web development, databases, and system design/architecture. Specialized in web development and design, with a strong foundation in design principles, patterns, and object-oriented programming.
hu.description2: Skilled in writing clean, maintainable code and applying Agile and Scrum methodologies for effective project management. Experienced in Test-Driven Development (TDD) and implementing secure applications, including JWT authentication and adherence to ISO 25010 software quality standards.

mysolution.description1: Designed and developed a customizable candidate onboarding portal for Mysolution customers using a wide stack: React, TypeScript, and Java Spring. Delivered a SQLite-backed Salesforce integration and scalable backend support for personalized business websites, ensuring a seamless and efficient user experience.
mysolution.description2: Performed detailed GDPR research to ensure full compliance and implemented secure JWT authentication with a robust user permissions system. Focused on building a platform that was not only secure but also user-friendly and adaptable to diverse client requirements. Took end-to-end responsibility for the project, delivering a technically sound and reliable solution.

hjemvik.description1: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform for Hjemvik, a Norwegian company, using React with TypeScript and Java Spring. Designed a sleek, responsive interface optimized for both desktop and mobile, creating a visually appealing and intuitive shopping experience.
hjemvik.description2: Focused on delivering a tailored solution for Hjemvik’s online presence, crafting a user experience that feels smooth and encourages purchases. Took full responsibility for both front-end and back-end development, ensuring the platform met the company’s business goals with precision and attention to detail.

languages.title: Languages
languages.norwegian: Norwegian - Work profiency and close to native. (C1)

hobbies.text: In my freetime I love to be active, and do things out in nature. I work out at the gym, go for walks with my dog, Rowdy (Golden Retriever), and go for {fjellturer} (mountain walks) throughout all of Norway. In the picture here above for example I was at Preikestolen in Rogaland with a friend of mine. Åja, and I love to listen to Rock / metal (especially from Kvelertak and Ensiferum).
